verbose_text: A number of basic studies have shown that the use of metformin to pre-treat cerebral ischemia in rats can reduce the area of cerebral infarction, reduce neuronal apoptosis, and improve neurological deficits [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR].
evidence: metformin to pre-treat cerebral ischemia in rats can reduce the area of cerebral infarction, reduce neuronal apoptosis
